CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such a superior device efficiency was attributed to the greatly enhanced exciton dissociation , higher and balanced charge carrier mobilities , and less recombination losses in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-14:PC71BM |

Explanation:

* PffBB-14:PC71BM is the only clear material name mentioned in the paragraph. It is a bulk heterojunction material used in organic solar cells.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such a superior device efficiency was attributed to the greatly enhanced exciton dissociation , higher and balanced charge carrier mobilities , and less recombination losses in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| superior device efficiency |
| greatly enhanced exciton dissociation |
| higher charge carrier mobilities |
| balanced charge carrier mobilities |
| less recombination losses |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| superior device efficiency |
| greatly enhanced exciton dissociation |
| higher charge carrier mobilities |
| balanced charge carrier mobilities |
| less recombination losses |

Explanation:

* "superior device efficiency" is a value of material property as it refers to the performance of the device made from the material.
* "greatly enhanced exciton dissociation" is a value of material property as it refers to the improved ability of the material to separate excitons.
* "higher charge carrier mobilities" is a value of material property as it refers to the increased speed of charge carriers in the material.
* "balanced charge carrier mobilities" is a value of material property as it refers to the equal speed of positive and negative charge carriers in the material.
* "less recombination losses" is a value of material property as it refers to the reduced loss of charge carriers due to recombination in the material.

Entities that were removed:

* "PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells" is not a value of material property as it refers to the type of cells made from the material, not a property of the material itself.
